<S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do:<s%> one <S%H7992>third<s%> of you, of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who <S%H935>come<s%> in on the <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> [shall be] <S%H7778>gatekeepers,<s%> <S%H5592><s%>
